description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Oysters With Tomato Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Oysters,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Seafood,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Smoked Oysters With Tomato Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the salsa, combine tomato, onion, dill and lemon juice in a small bowl. Season and set aside.
Line a wok with a double layer of foil. Combine rice, tea, sugar and fennel in a bowl. Spread rice mixture over foil and place a rack into the wok to sit above the rice mixture.
Cover wok and place over high heat. When it starts to smoke, arrange the oysters on the rack. Recover with lid and smoke for 3 minutes.
Transfer oysters to a serving platter and top each with a little of the salsa. Drizzle with oil and serve immediately.
